info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 3:57AM PST until December 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Western Siskiyou County, including Happy Camp, Somes Bar, Fort Jones, Etna, Callahan, Seiad Valley, and Sawyers Bar. Winter impacts are expected for all area roads and highways. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors. See http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions.
